page.title: 12BAUMBER SCHOOL CONTINUED
page.content: Later in the year individual and family portraits are taken.We went to Gibraltar Point for three days in the winter.We studied wildlife on the marshes and dunes.We saw how they ring birds and how they catch them too.We go swimming for about seven times each year.We get distance badges for the how many metres we do.Soon we are going to Belton House for a day.We shall take a packed lunch,and go to the adventure playground.We will go around the house and go on nature trail.The nurse comes to check our hair every so often.If necessary she gives you some special shampoo.She also has lately been to show us some films about our bodies.Sports day is held every year as well as a sponsered run.All this term we have been very busy with the Domesday Project.
